DOC.brief_summary: Cyclosporine Ophthalmic Emulsion is currently used in the treatment of dry eye syndrome. Contact lens wearers frequently suffer from dry eye syndrome. The purpose of this study is to evaluate cyclosporine ophthalmic emulsion verses re-wetting drops in the relief of dry eye symptoms in contact lens wearers
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy of Cyclosporine Ophthalmic Emulsion in the Treatment of Dry Eye Syndrome in Contact Lens Wearers
DOC.criteria: contact lens wearer clinical diagnosis of dry eye syndrome
DOC.keyword: cyclosporine, dry eye syndrome, contact lens
